mapper.update:
update t_product
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
pimage = #{pimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_product set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pimage = #{pimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
